CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in FAC .
CARDINAL . She was employed by ORG “ Raška Holding Kompanija ” DATE , a socially - owned company based in ORG ( hereinafter “ the debtor ” ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE , DATE and DATE respectively , ORG ordered the debtor to pay the applicant certain amounts on account of salary arrears and social insurance contributions , plus the costs of the civil proceedings . These judgments became final on DATE , DATE and CARDINAL DATE respectively .

CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE respectively , upon the applicant ’s request to that effect , ORG ordered the enforcement of the said judgments ; it further ordered the debtor to pay the applicant the enforcement costs .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG opened preliminary insolvency proceedings against the debtor .
CARDINAL . On DATE the same court opened insolvency proceedings against the debtor .
CARDINAL . The insolvency proceedings are still ongoing .
